name: Topaz (Wiggilis)
description:
Topaz is a game where you are faced with many obstacles as an indoor cat that got out of the house. You have to find your way back home while collecting necessities along the way, like your collar and finding your way throughout the city by using lost cat posters. Will you be able to help Topaz find his family?

Controls:

A/D - Move left or right

Space - To Jump

E - To MEOW!
